summary: 'The Nugget' looks at how instant wealth suddenly changes the lives of three working class men - not necessarily for the better, but always with hilarious consequences.
cast: Eric Bana|Stephen Curry|Dave O'Neil|Peter Moon|Vince Colosimo|Belinda Emmett|Chris Haywood|Jean Kittson|Max Cullen|Jeff Truman|Matthew Wooldridge|Sallyanne Ryan|Mark Coric|Hugh Bateman|Charmaine Hurrell|Karen Pang|Michael Cleary|Alan Bennett|Megan Bice|Joshua O'Brien|Matthew Riley|Rod Fuller|Alan Brough|Linda Cropper|Ross Granata|Michael Terry|Jane Hall|Phillip Ko|Bruce Chan|Nellie Bennett|Bill Young|Scott McGregor|David Taylor|George Hamilton|Derek Slater|Wayne Tsipouras|Daryl Honeysett|Henry Bennett|Owen Bates|Ruby Sitton|Peter White|Grace Tosh|Harry Tritton|Glenda Linscott|Jennifer Cluff|Adam Woods|William Radzievic|Scott Etherington|Rebecca Macy|Libby Howarth|Kathryn Maloney|Rachel Murdoch|Lucy Vorst|Stephen Lombardi|Brett Joseph

title: The Nugget
